viewResults: {NUM, plural, =0 {No results} one {1 more result} other {# more results}}
hideMessages: Hide {NUM, plural, one {this message} other {these messages}}.
charactersRemaining: {NUM, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} remaining.
cartProducts: You have {NUM, plural, one {1 product} other {# products}} in your cart.
reviewLimit: You are only allowed to post {NUM_REVIEWS, plural, one {1 product review} other {# product reviews}} every {NUM_LIMIT_DURATION, plural, one {1 day} other {# days}}
wishlistProducts: Your wishlist contains {NUM_PRODUCTS, plural, =0 {no products} one {1 product} other {# products in {NUM_CATEGORIES, plural, one {1 category} other {# categories}}}}
otherCarts: You {NUM, plural, offset:1 =1{have added this to your cart} one {and one other person have added this to their cart} other {and # others have added this to their carts}}
